turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to check my account balance.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Certainly. Please provide your account number or the last four digits of your social security number for verification.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: My account number is 1234567890. Wait, before you tell me the balance, can you tell me if any large transactions have gone through in the last 24 hours?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I am checking. Yes, there was a withdrawal of $500 at 10:30 AM today. Do you recognize this transaction?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, I authorized that. Okay, what's my current balance now?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Your current balance is $2,345.87. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, that seems low. Can you show me a list of the transactions from the last week? Preferably ordered by date.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am unable to display a list of transactions, but I can display them individually.  Would you like me to read them to you, one at a time? If so, please provide a date range. I can also send it to you, but I need to know your email address first.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that's frustrating. Just tell me the last 3 transactions and the dates. Also, how long is this going to take?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, please allow me a few moments. Transaction 1: July 26th, $500 withdrawal; Transaction 2: July 25th, $100 deposit; Transaction 3: July 24th, $25 purchase. The system processes transactions in real-time, so this information is up-to-the-minute.  Is there anything else?
